1680370.name: Gunning Over It!
1680370.description:
Escape from a test lab, find and free your fellow monkeys and unlock new weapons and find your way back to the jungle! Gunning Over It combines skill, patience and timing that tests your ability in a new way! 

Features

  • Highly addictive game loop!

  • Put your reflexes and skills to the test

  • Pistols, SMGs, Hotdog Gun (yes), RPGs, Assault Rifles, Cowboy Rifles, Shotguns - Combine them to climb your way through!

  • Find secrets, easter eggs and come up with your own strats using grenades.

  • Slow time briefly for a perfect shot or test your luck and reload mid air to keep the action going!

  • Eescape from the lab and find your way through the city.

  • Defeat the clown and his little circus. Dodge hammers, punches and falling obstacles.

  • Spook your way through a haunted castle.

  • Beat the developer time and unlock special items.

  • How you escape to the jungle is up to you. Find and save your fellow monkeys or leave them to their demise. 

  • Upgrade your abilities, collect bananas and trade them for upgrades with Bullet-Boy, Grenade-Boy and Time-Boy.

  • Checkpoints so you don't break your equipment (You're welcome).
1680370.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语*, 日语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 韩语*, 简体中文*, 土耳其语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
